code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import api from"../services/api.js";import"../styles/UserManagement.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TicketManagement=()=>{const[tickets,setTickets]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{api.get("/tickets").then(res=>setTickets(res.data));},[]);const handleDelete=async id=>{await api.delete(`/tickets/${id}`);setTickets(tickets.filter(t=>t._id!==id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Qu\u1EA3n l\xFD V\xE9 m\xE1y bay"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"M\xE3 v\xE9"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"H\xE3ng"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Kh\u1EDFi h\xE0nh"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\u0110i\u1EC3m \u0111\u1EBFn"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Gi\xE1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"H\xE0nh \u0111\u1ED9ng"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:tickets.map(ticket=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:ticket.code}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:ticket.airline}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:ticket.departure}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:ticket.destination}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[ticket.price," VND"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"action-btn",onClick:()=>handleDelete(ticket._id),children:"Xo\xE1"})})]},ticket._id))})]})]});};export default TicketManagement;
